name: Frosty Fiends
description:
Frosty Fiends

Controls are (A,D) to move Left and Right. (Left Mouse Button) to shoot Arrows.
(Objective, try and see the highest score you can achieve within 20s by shooting those Frosty Feinds and dodging/shooting the snowballs they throw at you, you lose points if you get hit by them.)

_The characters_ Player - Skadi
Crow Companion - Karma
 

Please be aware, there may be bugs. 

Credits: Art was done by me. 
I also had some help with coding from a buddy.
